name: † Spells of Magic Dark Theme †
description:
Dark theme for Spells of Magic that also removes the ads. There are still a few minor bugs that need to be fixed.
──↝⊰ ∙✦∙ ⊱↜──
Previously known as unholymaster, my last account was banned, so I'm reposting all of my styles.

user.name: AdaleighFaith
user.about: I mostly create styles to remove ads on websites and dark themes for the websites that I visit the most due to Irlen Syndrome and sensitivity to bright colours. Request style: https://form.jotform.co/61763045059861 ________________________________________________________________________________ For my sets I use the following: Backgrounds - #000000/black Secondary backgrounds (sidebars) - #0a0a0a or #181717/dark grey Text - #444444 or #a2a0a0/medium grey Links - #9043cc/dark purple Links hover - #be7fef/light purple ________________________________________________________________________________ Midnight Set † Midnight | Userstyles Dark Theme † ________________________________________________________________________________ Advertisement Removers *NO LONGER MAINTAINED | † Userstyles Advertisement Remover † *NO LONGER MAINTAINED | † Pixlr Advertisement Remover † † Pastebin Advertisement Remover † † MeetMe Advertisement Remover † † FriendProject Advertisement Remover † † eBay Advertisement Remover † † AdF.ly Advertisement Remover †
